localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Self-learning and discovery are the central tenet of Breadcrumb! The app offers a vast collection of curated content as collections & learning paths! Your child 🧒 📕 Decides what to learn 📝 Discovers their potential 📈 Journals their progress! ❌ No ads
blogPost.body: Self-learning and discovery are the central tenet of Breadcrumb! The app offers a vast collection of curated content as collections & learning paths! Your child 🧒 📕 Decides what to learn 📝 Discovers their potential 📈 Journals their progress! ❌ No ads
blogPost.title: Breadcrumb - Enabling children to explore and learn on their own
blogPost.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: 自学和发现是Breadcrumb的核心宗旨! 这款应用以集合和学习路径的形式提供了大量的精选内容! 您的孩子 🧒 📕 决定学习什么 📝 发现他们的潜力 📈 记录他们的进步! ❌ 无广告
localize.tagline: 让孩子们能够自主探索、自主学习。

localize.description: 自學和發現是Breadcrumb的核心宗旨! 這款應用以集合和學習路徑的形式提供了大量的精選內容! 您的孩子 🧒 📕 決定學習什麼 📝 發現他們的潛力 📈 記錄他們的進步! ❌ 無廣告
localize.tagline: 讓孩子們能夠自主探索、自主學習。

previous.excerpt: Salut is a creator platform for fitness pros. We make it fun and easy for fitness creators to build and monetize a community. Schedule, stream, socialize, and monetize virtual fitness content - all in one app for free.
previous.title: Salut - The creator platform for fitness

next.excerpt: Bounty lets you get paid for referring friends to jobs. If you don't know someone you can refer, share the bounty and get a cut of the prize pool.
next.title: Bounty - Get paid for referring friends to jobs 💰

localize.description: Bounty可以让你因推荐朋友工作而获得报酬。如果您不认识可以推荐的人，分享赏金并获得奖金池的一部分。
localize.tagline: 推荐朋友工作获得报酬 💰

localize.description: Bounty可以讓你因推薦朋友工作而獲得報酬。如果您不認識可以推薦的人，分享賞金並獲得獎金池的一部分。
localize.tagline: 推薦朋友工作獲得報酬 💰
